```{r setup, include=FALSE}
options(scipen = 999)
```


```{r}
input<-c(+3, +3, +4, -2, -4)
```


## Part 1
Simply add all of the elements of the array

```{r}
part1<-sum(input)
part1
```
## Part 2

Create a place to hold the list of frequencies that have already been met - (dictionary).  Then keep running through the list of frequency changes until 

```{r}
i<-2
### set initial value
part2<-input[1]
### create the dictionary
beenthere<-dict()
### while the value isn't in the dictionary
while(!(beenthere$has(part2))){
  ### add it to the dictionary
  beenthere$set(part2,part2)
  ### add the next value from the input
  part2<-part2+input[i]
  ### increment
  i<-i+1
  ### if at the end of the line, restart from the beginning
  if(i>length(input)){i<-1}}
part2

```
